name: HumanitZ Demo
description:
10 years after the plague hit, you are all that's left, or are you? 

  • Different Zombie Types
  • 4 Player Coop (demo is only single player)
  • Loads of Weapons
  • Drivable Vehicles
  • Huge World to Explore
  • Dynamic Weather
  • Character Selection
  • Character Perks
  • Perma Death Mode
  • Survive, Explore, Scavenge, Build, Craft, Hunt, Farm, Fish

SURVIVE: Survive as long as you can in the apocalypse, make your mark leave your legacy

EXPLORE: Keep on the move to find new locations and increase your chances of survival

SCAVENGE: Search for food, weapons, and resources to assist you and your group in the fight to thrive

BUILD: Construct bases to keep zeeks out, fortify abandoned buildings, or create a safe house

CRAFT: Use your items to craft better gear and what you need to survive

HUNT: Urban areas may be too dangerous so take to the fields and woods to hunt for wild game

FARM: Grow your own crops

FISH: Catch what is left in the ponds to keep well fed
